title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. B, pt. 860 - Water Quality Standards For The Delaware River Basin (article 3)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. B, pt. 860 - Water Quality Standards For The Delaware River Basin (article 3)

State Regulations

Basinwide Surface Water Quality Standards (§ 860.1 to 860.6)

Interstate Streams-Nontidal (§ 860.7 to 860.25)

Interstate Streams-Tidal (§ 860.26 to 860.31)

Ground Water-Basinwide (§ 860.32 to 860.37)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. B, pt. 860

Statutory authority: Delaware River Basin Compact, art. 5; § 14.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
